title: City Mayors: Kadir Topbas - Mayor of Istanbul

quotes: 5 April 2009: Istanbul is the only city in the world to straddle two continents, an historic bridge between Europe and Asia.
Topbas was born in 1945 in the Black Sea province of Artvin (which borders Georgia), moving with his family to Istanbul a year later.
He graduated from the Marmara University Faculty of Theology in 1972 and Mimar Sinan University’s Department of Architecture in 1974.
He graduated from the Marmara University Faculty of Theology in 1972 and Mimar Sinan University’s Department of Architecture in 1974.

Between 1994 and 1998, he served as architectural adviser to Istanbul Mayor (and now Prime Minister) Recep Tayyip Erdogan, overseeing the restoration of a number of historic buildings in the city and was also appointed to act as deputy

organizations.name: United Cities and Local Governments
quotes: An architect by training, recently he was elected co-president of the United Cities and Local Governments organisation.

organizations.name: Istanbul University
quotes: He then obtained a PhD in architectural history at Istanbul University (for the thesis ‘Hidiv Kasrı and its place in Bosphorus civilian architecture’), going on to work as a freelance architect for several years.
